member.name: T:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter
member.summary: Converts a Visual Studio project file to the Visual Studio 2008 project file format.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.ConversionSkippedBecauseProjectAlreadyConverted
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the last attempted conversion was skipped because the project file is already in the latest format.
member.returns: true if the last attempted conversion was skipped because the project file is already in the latest format; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.ConversionWarnings
member.summary: Gets a list of warnings generated during the conversion.
member.returns: A string array containing any warnings generated during the conversion.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.Convert
member.summary: Converts the project specified by the property and saves it in the file specified by the property.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.Convert(Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ProjectLoadSettings)
member.summary: Converts the project specified by the property and saves it in the file specified by the property.
member.param: A flag that determine whether the project ignores non-existent .target files when loading.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.Convert(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the project specified by the property and saves it in the file specified by the property.
member.param: The fully qualified path to MSBuild.exe.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.ConvertInMemory(Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine)
member.summary: Creates a new project in memory from the .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.ConvertInMemory(Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.Engine,Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.ProjectLoadSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new project in memory from the .
member.param: A flag that determine whether the project ignores non-existent .target files when loading.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.IsUserFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the project file being converted is a .user file.
member.returns: true if the project file being converted is a .user file; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.NewProjectFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the new project file name.
member.returns: A string representing the new project file name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.OldProjectFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the old project file name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Build.Conversion.ProjectFileConverter.SolutionFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the solution file that contains the project being converted.
member.returns: The name of the solution file that contains the project being converted.
